page.title: 18INDUSTRY IN SOUTHEND
page.content: {Southend}has 18 estates - 9 in this area.1st in 1944 when 5 scheduled by council.Much ind decent from{LONDON due to bomb damage and later IDC policy.All near fast rd link to LDN.+ cheap flat land often old clay pits + use local lab.Estates largely replaced old inner area workshops.Older estates e.g.{Grainger rd}nr vic.station have smaller units & craft inds = 25% eng. 25% clothing.Newer estates on urban fringe are larger,larger units often standardised and subdivided,have more rapid change of user,+greater range of functions e.g.{Temple Farm}20% eng,30% shippers/distributors,20% services eg. Radio Rentals.Increasingly estates built by property developers on 'waste land'e.g.{Rosshill}squeezed between crematorium and main fire st.Currently 12% of units for sale/vacant yet more units being built!
